title.narrative: Agro-Processing, Productivity Enhancement and Livelihood Improvement Support Project

description.narrative: The objective of the Project is to enhance agricultural productivity of small and medium scale farmers and improve value addition along priority value chains in the Participating States

participating-org.narrative: Federal Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Establishment of the SCO in Kogi State | Description :No later than three (3) months after the Effective Date,the Recipient shall ensure the establishment of the SCO in Kogi State, with staff with terms of reference, experience andqualifications acceptable to the Association recruited in accordance with the provisions of Section III, Schedule 2 of theFinancing Agreement. | Due Date :31-Jan-2018

Finance Agreement :Project Implementation Manual | Description :No later than three (3) months after the Effective Date, theRecipient shall, and shall cause each Participating State, to adopt the Project Implementation Manual (PIM) in form and substancesatisfactory to the Association, and, thereafter carry out the Project and cause each Participating State to carry out itsrespective activities under the Project in accordance with the provisions of the PIM. | Due Date :31-Jan-2018

title.narrative: Increase in productivity of agricultural produce of priority value chains by project supported farmers
Increase in processed output of priority value chains by project beneficiaries (disaggregated by type of processing and gender)
Farmers reached with agricultural assets under the project (disaggreagted by gender)
Agribusiness alliances and out-grower schemes supported
Clients who have adopted an improved agr. technology promoted by the project
Federal and state partners (public and private) with improved skills contributing to project activities
Clients who adopted an improved agr. technology promoted by project – female
Social and environment al safeguards management plan implemented in compliance with the PMI
Aggregation facilities constructed or rehabilitated with project support
Women and Youth empowered through grants, start-ups and mentorship (disaggregated by gender)
Grievances registered related to delivery of project benefits that are actually addressed
Beneficiaries satisfied with delivery (timely and quality) of project benefits
Technologies demonstrated in the project areas (number)
Increase in processed output by medium to larger processing units under BA/Outgrower
Increased in processed output by cottage units
